casebody.data:
Friday, February 7, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-2534. McClure v. McClure.

Greene App. No. 95CA86. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of trial court proceedings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.

F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents.
